definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
to make a circuit/to circle/circle/circumference/lap/cycle/complete/all/all over/thorough/to help financially

sentences.english: This feign, the Eastern Zhou Dynasty is planted afresh certainly paddy, when reaping, you capture again they.
sentences.chinese: 這佯，東周一定重新種稻，收割時您再奪取它們。

sentences.english: Maoqinggou cemetery was located in Liangcheng County, Inner Mongolia, dated back to the Eastern Zhou Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 毛慶溝墓地是內蒙古涼城縣東周時期的墓地。

sentences.english: The Eastern Zhou period is also designated as a period of a hundred schools.
sentences.chinese: 東周時期也被指定爲一個時期的百家爭鳴。

sentences.english: In a word. East River Region was the economic barycenter of Lingnan in Eastern Zhou Period.
sentences.chinese: 歸納之，東周時期東江流域是嶺南的經濟重心。

sentences.english: Donghu is a branch of the Hu people who act actively in the Northeast of Yan.
sentences.chinese: 東胡是東周時期活躍於燕國東北面的一支胡人。

sentences.english: The research on pictorial bronzes of Eastern Zhou is a major subject of study on art history and archeology.
sentences.chinese: 東周畫像銅器是美術史和考古學研究的重要課題。

sentences.english: The War of Yan Ducal in the Eastern Zhou Dynasty and Its Role in the History;
sentences.chinese: 東周畫像銅器是美術史和考古學研究的重要課題。

sentences.english: Eastern Zhou Dynasty(771B. C. -221B. C. ) is firmly thought of a glorious period in culture of Chinese ancient history.
sentences.chinese: 東周時期一向被認爲是我國古代歷史文明的光輝時代。

sentences.english: Chapter three is on bronze weapons of the Eastern Zhou .
sentences.chinese: 第三章討論東周時期的青銅兵器。

definition: Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
set of bells (old Chinese music instrument)
ribbon (as a decoration)/cordon (diagonal belt worn as a sign of office or honor)
History of Zhou of the Northern Dynasties, twelfth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Linghu Defen 令狐德棻[Ling2 hu2 De2 fen1] in 636 during Tang Dynasty, 50 scrolls
item made from woven silk or rayon
